name: Bholu
description: Hello, I'm a software engineer by day and a crypto enthusiast by night. Currently, I actively maintain validator nodes for various networks, on both testnets and mainnets. With EigenLayer, I have over three months of experience running an operator on Goerli/Holesky with 99.9% uptime and with support for multiple AVSs, viz. EigenLayer's native EigenDA, Mangata, and Omni.
